page.title: 15 An Industry of Cwmbran
page.content:
Alfa-Laval is a prosperous marketing company,supplying pumps to the British Dairy Farmer and exporting to fifteen countries world wide. Their modern offices and warehouse facilities are set in parkland on the Ty-Coch Industrial Estate. The site was chosen for its proximity to both town and leisure resources. Alfa-Laval came to CWmbran in 1974 because the location was ideal. There was a good transport network, also government grants were available and housing in the area was plentiful. Alfa-Laval employ upwards of ninety people who all work from 8.30am until 4.30pm. They draw the majority of their workforce locally.
Written after a visit by: Steven,Matthew and Mark (Oakfield)
